"><b>back in 2011</b></a>, and has picked it back up now that weÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve reached 1.0. Using career mode, Quill18 shows you his successes and his failures uncut, which makes for a great video series. Well worth a look if you ask us!<br/></p>

And he even reminds us of the weird gear hotkey behaviour.

It is really refreshing, watching someone you knows basically next to nothing about the game - but at the same time very frustrating and screen-screaming-inducing!

Edited May 20, 2015 by KerbMav
It;s funny how he still tries to do the 45 degree turn, nobody told him about aerodynamics yet

great video. I was thinking the other day how much fun i had when i knew nothing. I mean i still love the game, but it was just different and more exciting when i was exploring what the game had to offer
